To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private KeltnerChannels _kch;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_kch = KCH(symbol, period, k);

// In OnData()
if (_kch.IsReady)
{
    var middleBand = _kch.MiddleBand.Value;
    var upperBand = _kch.UpperBand.Value;
    var lowerBand = _kch.LowerBand.Value;
    var averageTrueRange = _kch.AverageTrueRange.Value;
    var current = _kch.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.kch = self.KCH(symbol, period, k)

# In OnData()
if self.kch.IsReady:
    middle_band = self.kch.MiddleBand.Value
    upper_band = self.kch.UpperBand.Value
    lower_band = self.kch.LowerBand.Value
    average_true_range = self.kch.AverageTrueRange.Value
    current = self.kch.Current.Value
